introduction.title:
Marion Ott,
Front-end developer
introduction.text: I'm a 28 years old front-end developer, currently enrolled in a Bachelor Web @Hetic (Paris, France). I specialize in JavaScript, trying to master the art of React. Have a look at a selection of my projects, and feel free to drop me a message to get more information.

projects.title: Nespresso
projects.desc: This is a personal redesign of Nespresso's website. I chose to minimise the navigation and enlarge the grid. The overall design was also changed to fit the upscale image of the company.

projects.title: Grabber
projects.desc: As a school assignment, I had to create a website 'elegant but urban'. I decided to imagine a service where users could rent longboard on the spot. The front-end was done by KÃ©vin Manssat, and I created the design.

projects.title: Substudio
projects.desc: As another school assignement, we were asked to create a streaming platform for fan movies. The whole interface is dynamic using a JavaScript object. I also designed the website, but chose to keep it simple as we had only a few days to complete the challenge.
